EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=Hi there}}, Thanks for Being a Bro!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Bro! Thank you for joining the Chivas 12 Brotocol! We hope you had a blast.
Check out the Chivas Singapore Facebook page <[[https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.1403532072993695.1073741878.392545357425710&type=1]]> for photos of what went down that night and like the page for updates on Chivas Brotocol.
See you at the next one!
